Part 2 - Installation
Using the BlackBerry Desktop Manager

- Make sure you have the latest Desktop Manager Software by going to your mobile provider's website and clicking on BlackBerry Support.  
  You can also download it from here: <a href=" http://www.blackberry.net/products/software/desktop/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.blackberry.net/products/software/desktop/</a>
- Connect your BlackBerry using the USB cable to your PC
- Load up the BlackBerry Desktop Manager Software, and then the BlackBerry Application Loader software
- Click NEXT
- Select the USB port, and click NEXT
- Click on ADD and find the folder on your harddrive where you unzipped the game files.
- Select the .alx file for the game, and click OPEN
- Make sure the game file is Checked off and then select NEXT
- Review the changes you are making to your device, and when you are satisified, click FINISH to install the game


Part 3 - Removal
Using the BlackBerry Application Loader from a PC.

- Plug your BlackBerry into the USB slot of the Computer
- Load up the Desktop Manager Software
- Load up the Application Loader
- Click NEXT, then NEXT
- Scroll down to the game you wish to remove and click on it
- Click on the Delete button
- Click NEXT
- Click FINISH
- Click CLOSE
